stanza.line: To me fair friend you never can be (a)old(/a)
For as you were when first your eye I (b)eyed(/b)
Such seems your beauty still three winters (a)cold(/a)
Have from the forests shook three summers' (b)pride(/b)
Three beauteous springs to yellow autumn (c)turned(/c)
In process of the seasons have I (d)seen(/d)
Three April perfumes in three hot Junes (c)burned(/c)
Since first I saw you fresh which yet are (d)green(/d)
Ah yet doth beauty like a dial (e)hand(/e)
Steal from his figure and no pace (f)perceived(/f)
So your sweet hue which methinks still doth (e)stand(/e)
Hath motion and mine eye may be (f)deceived(/f)
For fear of which hear this thou age (g)unbred(/g)
Ere you were born was beauty's summer (g)dead(/g)
